long_description: The REI Stratocruiser 26 Wheeled Luggage combines the ease of wheeled luggage with the flexibility of a backpack. It's big enough for longer trips and includes a detachable daypack for versatility. Backpack-style shoulder harness, lumbar pad and padded waistbelt provide a great fit and comfortable carrying; suspension system hides cleanly away with a single zipper. A handy detachable daypack secures to the main pack via front-panel buckles and a zipper, or slide it over the telescoping handle of the main bag. Daypack has a an organizer panel and back security pocket; interior neoprene pocket fits tablets and most 13 in. laptops. Rugged wheels and housings help the bag roll smoothly; kickstand lets you park it upright. Rugged telescopic pull handle locks in up/down position and has a soft handle grip. Interior frame provides structure; top and side grab handles ease hauling. Panel-opening zipper provides easy access to main compartment; mesh pockets and compression straps help organize the interior. Main front zip pocket is roomy enough for a jacket; side stash pocket has an elastic closure. Exterior zippers on the Stratocruiser 26 Wheeled Luggage can be secured with standard travel locks, sold separately.
short_description: The REI Stratocruiser 26 Wheeled Luggage combines the ease of wheeled luggage with the flexibility of a backpack. It's big enough for longer trips and includes a detachable daypack for versatility.
